column4: ok I'm back on, could you please tell me the apt get adress again alex
in my home folder together with the inf file
downloaded
yes
TGP0: ?? how
hold one
are those downloaded drivers or from CD?
do 'lspci' and find your card write down the hex address
'lspci -n' and write down the numbers in a format like xxxx:xxxx
AlReece I cant connect to the ndiswrapper wiki for some reason
AlReece on that site, you will find somewhere that has a list of drivers listed out with that xxxx:xxxx address
AlReece those are the drivers specific for your card
AlReece on another note, the method described at http://bcm43xx.berlios.de is much better than ndiswrapper
anyway, find the driver that matches that second address code and everything will pop up hunky dory, has the last 3 times I'v followed that path
the list is there
I helped someone with this last week and the list was there
here's the link http://ftp.us.dell.com/network/R115321.EXE
glad that got you going
have you been into your iwconfig and set it up there?
and all of its other info is correct?
and key
